Name: SpiderCooking
Description: Create an area of miasma around, dealing slow damage to enemies inside.

Name: EliteLavaBucket
Description: Drop lava on the ground, burning targets slowly.
Increase damage by <color=green>30%</color> and increase duration of lava by <color=green>1</color> second.
Throw 4 lava buckets and increase lava size by <color=green>20%</color>

Name: HoloBomb
Description: A bomb that explodes, dealing damage to all nearby targets.
Reduce the time between attacks by <color=green>20%</color>.

Name: PsychoAxe
Description: Throw an axe that spirals outward from the player.
Increase size of axe by <color=green>20%</color>. Increase damage of axe by <color=green>20%</color>.
Increase damage by <color=green>33%</color>, and size by <color=green>20%</color>.

Name: BLBook
Description: Repels targets with orbiting BL Books.
Increase damage by <color=green>30%</color> and increase duration by <color=green>1</color> second.

Name: FanBeam
Description: Shoot a powerful laser beam from the microphone.
Fire an additional beam from behind

Name: GlowStick
Description: Throw a glowstick to a nearby target and then spins back to player.
